title: Mahou no Angel Sweet Mint
synopsis: Mint is a girl who happens to be the princess of the world of dreams and magic. The natural environment of her world is a reflection of the dreams of the people on Earth. It is now in danger as people lose faith in their dreams and let darkness enter their hearts. The environment of Mint's world is starting to wither and die.
voices: ['Kasahara, Hiroko', 'Sasaki, Nozomu', 'Takizawa, Kumiko', 'Maruyama, Hiroko', 'Abe, Atsushi', 'Ezawa, Masako', 'Ezawa, Masako', 'Tamagawa, Sakiko']
staff: [['Sakurai, Hiroaki', ['Episode Director']], ['Yoshida, Hiroshi', ['Episode Director']], ['Koyama, Takao', ['Script']], ['Arakawa, Naruhisa', ['Storyboard']]]
